metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19760 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: cfg_init in confuse.c in libConfuse 3.2.2 has a memory leak.

notes.Note: msalvatore> This CVE may be disputed by upstream. From issue #120: "The bug report is apparently incorrect and the ASAN output looks like a premature exit without cleanup on an error in the caller, not the library." Ignoring this CVE

criterions.comment: confuse: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
